lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Lakers center Kwame Brown was charged with disorderly conduct and interfering with a police officer after his cousin was charged with drunken driving. Brown faces misdemeanor charges after the police in Valdosta, Ga., pulled over Charles Warren Jr. early Saturday for driving the wrong way down a one-way street, the police said. There was no indication Brown was in the car, the police said, but he happened to be in the area. He became disruptive and tried to interfere with the officers’ investigation, the police said.
